title: Crab tart
description: For a holiday lunch with friends, try this creamy crab tart with guacamole on the side. Serve with lightly dressed salad leaves and new potatoes.Equipment: You will need a 23cm/9in diameter, 4cm/1½in deep flan tin.
ingredients: a little plain flour, for dusting
salt and freshly ground black pepper
3 dressed crabs or 450g/1lb white crab meat
2 ripe avocados, flesh only, cut into chunky dice
3 tomatoes, skinned, deseeded and finely diced
1 red chilli, deseeded and very finely chopped
